item.description:
Join us for a great evening of networking, fellowship, and engaging discussion with fellow Christian business leaders and entrepreneurs over light food and beverages. Meet the meeting organizer and help shape the future of the group!

What you will get out of this group:

-- Networking with other business leaders of faith

-- Discussions on challenging issues at the intersection of faith, business, and ethics

-- Lasting and supportive relationships

-- Potential Business Partners, Customers, and Mentors


We will start with introductions, then engage in discussion on business topics set before the meeting, and also discuss a challenge posed by one of the group members.
item.name: Christian Entrepreneurs and Business Owners Networking/Discussion Group
